flavorText:
"We'll distract them. The rest of you, get out of here!"
—Alux, Skysail defender

foreignData.flavorText:
„Wir werden sie ablenken. Der Rest von euch: Raus hier!"
—Alux, Himmelstadt-Verteidiger
foreignData.name: Lockvogel-Gambit
foreignData.text: Bestimme für jeden Gegner bis zu eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die jener Spieler kontrolliert, und bringe die Kreatur dann auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück, es sei denn, ihr Beherrscher lässt dich eine Karte ziehen.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Los distraeremos. ¡Los demás deben irse de aquí!"
—Álux, defensor de Puertoaéreo
foreignData.name: Táctica de señuelo
foreignData.text: Por cada oponente, elige hasta una criatura objetivo que controla ese jugador, luego regresa esa criatura a la mano de su propietario a menos que su controlador te haga robar una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
« On va faire diversion. Vous autres, allez-vous-en ! »
—Alux, défenseur de Vogueciel
foreignData.name: Pari leurreur
foreignData.text: Pour chaque adversaire, choisissez jusqu'à une créature ciblée que ce joueur contrôle, puis renvoyez cette créature dans la main de son propriétaire à moins que son contrôleur ne vous fasse piocher une carte.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Penseremo noi a distrarli. Voi andatevene da qui!"
—Alux, difensore della Solcanembi
foreignData.name: Stratagemma Diversivo
foreignData.text: Per ogni avversario, scegli fino a una creatura bersaglio controllata da quel giocatore, poi fai tornare quella creatura in mano al suo proprietario a meno che il suo controllore non ti faccia pescare una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
「我々が引きつける。残りは早く逃げろ！」
――スカイセイルの防衛者、アルックス
foreignData.name: おとりの計略
foreignData.text: 各対戦相手につき、そのプレイヤーがコントロールしているクリーチャー最大１体を対象とする。それのコントローラーが「あなたはカードを１枚引く」を選ばないかぎり、そのクリーチャーをオーナーの手札に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText:
"Vamos distraí-los. Vocês, dêem o fora daqui!"
— Alux, defensor da Vela Celeste
foreignData.name: Estratagema do Chamariz
foreignData.text: Para cada oponente, escolha até uma criatura alvo que aquele jogador controla. Depois, devolva aquela criatura para a mão de seu dono, a menos que seu controlador faça com que você compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Мы их отвлечем. А вы выбирайтесь отсюда».
— Алукс, защитник Небесного Паруса
foreignData.name: Обманная Уступка
foreignData.text: За каждого оппонента выберите не более одного целевого существа под контролем того игрока, затем верните то существо в руку его владельца, если только контролирующий его игрок не заставит вас взять карту.

name: Decoy Gambit
originalText: For each opponent, choose up to one target creature that player controls, then return that creature to its owner's hand unless its controller has you draw a card.

rulings.text: As the Decoy Gambit resolves, first the next opponent in turn order (or, if it’s an opponent’s turn, the opponent whose turn it is) chooses whether you’ll draw a card or return their creature that was targeted to its owner’s hand, then each other opponent in turn order does so knowing the choices made before them. After all choices are made, you draw the appropriate number of cards. After you’ve drawn, the appropriate creatures are all simultaneously returned to their owners’ hands.
For each opponent, if you didn’t choose a target creature they control or if that creature has become an illegal target, that player can’t choose for you to draw a card.
If a creature targeted by Decoy Gambit changes controller, it’s no longer a legal target.

text: For each opponent, choose up to one target creature that player controls, then return that creature to its owner's hand unless its controller has you draw a card.
